content:
Create a Change Request

To roll out a solution to a problem and resolve an incident, create a change request. 

Available in: Lightning Experience with your standard Service Cloud license. 
From the Service Console, click the dropdown, select Change Requests, then Select New.

Enter information such as reviewer name or remediation plan, and save your changes.

After creating a change request, use work plans and work steps to outline actions needed to resolve the incident.
title: Service Cloud Change Request
